No.3686

－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
Caves are dark and dangerous. Wild[换行]
POKéMON can appear anywhere in them.[翻页]
If there is an emergency, rush to a[翻页]
POKéMON CENTER or use items.[翻页]
New towns await discovery beyond some[翻页]
caves, so don't give up.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
洞穴很阴暗，很危险。[换行]
野生的POKéMON在其中无处不在。[翻页]
如果有紧急情况，[翻页]
就快去POKéMON CENTER或者使用道具。[翻页]
新的城镇就在那些洞穴外，[翻页]
所以不要放弃。[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

You must collect info and solve[翻页]

need to get around an obstacle?[翻页]

person out of the way?[结束]

No.3689
001B3F7Fh,237
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
In a battle, POKéMON try to reduce[换行]
one another's vitality, expressed as[翻页]
HP. If a POKéMON's HP falls to zero,[翻页]
it faints, and the other POKéMON[翻页]
wins. By winning a battle, POKéMON[翻页]
earn EXP. Points, which help them[翻页]
level up (grow stronger).[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
对战中POKéMON需要尽力消耗[换行]
对方的HP。[翻页]
如果POKéMON的HP归零，[翻页]
它就倒下了。同时另一者的POKéMON[翻页]
就赢了。赢得战斗的同时，[翻页]
POKéMON也获得可以让他们[翻页]
等级上升的经验值！[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

A POKéMON's vitality is expressed in HP.[换行]
If a POKéMON is hurt in battle, HP is[翻页]
subtracted. If its HP drops to zero,[翻页]
the POKéMON faints.[翻页]
Heal hurt or fainted POKéMON at a[翻页]
POKéMON CENTER or by using items.[结束]

HP就会减少。[翻页]
如果HP归零，它就倒下了。[翻页]

any status problems and fully restore[翻页]

This service is free, so get in the[翻页]
habit of healing your POKéMON often.[结束]

that is inflicted on a POKéMON by its[翻页]
foe's attack. These include burns,[翻页]
paralysis, poisoning, sleep, and[翻页]
freezing. These can be healed by[翻页]
visiting a POKéMON CENTER or using[翻页]
the appropriate item.[结束]

[l][0Ah] Select “WITHDRAW ITEM.”[换行]
[l][0Bh] Select the item to be withdrawn.[换行]
[l][0Ch] The item can be withdrawn and[换行]
   placed in the BAG's ITEMS POCKET.[换行]
   It may also be directly given to a[换行]
   POKéMON to hold.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
[l][0Ah] 选择“WITHDRAW ITEM”[换行]
[l][0Bh] 选中需要取出的道具。[换行]
[l][0Ch] 选中的道具会被取出[换行]
   放进BAG的口袋里。[换行]
   同样也可以直接交给[换行]
   POKéMON装备上。[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

No.3807
001B77DDh,167
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
[l][0Ah] Select “DEPOSIT ITEM.”[换行]
[l][0Bh] Select the item in the BAG to be[换行]
   deposited using the [l][04h] Control Pad.[换行]
[l][0Ch] If there is nothing in the BAG, this[换行]
   command can't be used![结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
[l][0Ah] 选择“DEPOSIT ITEM。”[换行]
[l][0Bh] 通过[l][04h]十字键选择BAG[换行]
   里需要存放的道具。[换行]
[l][0Ch] 如果BAG里没有任何东西，[换行]
   这个功能就用不了！[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

No.3808
001B7884h,173
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
When MAIL is taken from a POKéMON,[换行]
it is moved to the MAILBOX. If it has[换行]
no MAIL, the MAILBOX can't be used.[换行]
[l][0Ah] Select MAIL by name to read it or[换行]
   make a POKéMON hold it.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
当MAIL被从POKéMON身上拿走时，[换行]
它会被传到MAILBOX。如果[换行]
没有MAIL的话，那就不能用MAILBOX了。[换行]
[l][0Ah]选择MAIL标题来阅读[换行]
   或者让POKéMON持有它。[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

No.3809
001B7931h,154
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
You may not “RUN” from a TRAINER[换行]
battle![换行]
[l][0Ah] You may “RUN” from a wild POKéMON.[换行]
[l][0Bh] Your chance of escape is improved[换行]
   if your POKéMON in battle is fast.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
你不可以从跟TRAINER的[换行]
战斗中“RUN”！[换行]
[l][0Ah]你可以在跟野生POKéMON的战斗中“RUN”。[换行]
[l][0Bh]如果你的POKéMON的速度够快[换行]
   你逃跑的机率会提高。[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

No.3858
001B7E16h,244
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
HP indicates a POKéMON's vitality.[换行]
If a POKéMON's HP drops to zero, it[翻页]
faints and is unable to battle.[翻页]
So, the key in battle is to try to[翻页]
reduce the foe's HP to zero.[翻页]
If your POKéMON are hurt, restore their[翻页]
HP at a POKéMON CENTER or use items.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
HP就是POKéMON的生命值。[换行]
如果POKéMON的HP降至零，它就会[翻页]
晕倒且不能战斗。[翻页]
所以，战斗的要点就是要把[翻页]
对手的HP降至零。[翻页]
如果你的POKéMON受伤了，可以在[翻页]
精灵中心或者用道具恢复HP。[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

No.3859
001B7F0Ah,256
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
EXP. Points stands for “Experience[换行]
Points.” POKéMON gain EXP. Points by[翻页]
participating in winning battles.[翻页]
When a POKéMON accumulates sufficient[翻页]
EXP. Points, it levels up. The EXP. Bar[翻页]
indicates accumulated EXP. Points.[翻页]
It returns to zero upon leveling up.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
EXP. Points就是战斗经验的简称。[换行]
POKéMON得到EXP. Points的方法就是[翻页]
在战斗中取得胜利。[翻页]
当POKéMON积累了足够的[翻页]
EXP. Points后，它就会升级。那条EXP. Bar[翻页]
代表了目前积累了的EXP. Points。[翻页]
升级后EXP. Bar将会清零。[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

including attacks and those with[翻页]
special effects. The kinds of moves[翻页]
that can be learned vary for each[翻页]
POKéMON. Some moves can be learned[翻页]
from items.[结束]

四个技能。技能有很多种，[翻页]
包括了攻击技能和[翻页]
带有特殊效果的技能。[翻页]
可以学到这些技能的POKéMON[翻页]

No.3861
001B80ECh,214
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
ATTACK indicates the power of an[换行]
offensive move. The higher this stat,[翻页]
the more powerful the move.[翻页]
It is applied for the following move[翻页]
types: NORMAL, POISON, GROUND,[翻页]
FLYING, BUG, FIGHTING, ROCK, GHOST,[翻页]
and STEEL.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
ATTACK代表了攻击性的[换行]
技能的力量。数值越高，[翻页]
作出的伤害越高。[翻页]
这个数值会影响以下属性的[翻页]
攻击力：NORMAL，POISON，GROUND，[翻页]
FLYING，BUG，FIGHTING，ROCK，GHOST[翻页]
和STEEL。[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

The higher this stat, the less damage[翻页]

数值越高，对方的物理ATTACK[翻页]

Lv. (Level) indicates the growth and[换行]

In general, when a POKéMON levels up,[翻页]
its stats such as HP, ATTACK, and[翻页]
DEFENSE rise, making it stronger.[翻页]
POKéMON may learn a new move upon[翻页]

Lv.(等级)代表了[换行]
POKéMON的成长度和力量。[翻页]
一般来说，当POKéMON升级时，[翻页]
它的能力值像是HP，ATTACK[翻页]
和DEFENSE都会提升，使它更强。[翻页]
POKéMON升级时可能会[翻页]
学到新的技能。[结束]

POKéMON and moves are classified by[换行]
type. Every type has advantageous and[翻页]
disadvantageous matchups against[翻页]
other types. For example, like a rock-[翻页]
paper-scissors game, the WATER type is[翻页]
strong against the FIRE type and weak[翻页]
against the GRASS type.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
POKéMON和技能都是以属性划分。[换行]
每个属性相对于[翻页]
其他属性都有优势跟劣势。[翻页]
就像是剪刀石头布游戏，[翻页]
WATER对FIRE属性很有效，[翻页]
可是对着GRASS属性[翻页]
就没有太大效果了。[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

都会被放在[翻页]
KEY ITEMS POCKET里。[翻页]
重要的道具可以被使用，或者[翻页]
登录后用SELECT键快捷使用。[翻页]
当登录后，登录了的道具[翻页]
可以跳过MENU和BAG直接使用。[结束]

Status problems include:[换行]

Paralysis: May prevent moves.[翻页]
Burn: HP loss and lowers ATTACK.[翻页]
Freeze: Can't use moves.[翻页]
These can be healed with items, etc.[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

中毒：HP不断减少。[翻页]
麻痹：可能不能使用MOVES。[翻页]
烧伤：HP减少，ATTACK降低。[翻页]
冰冻：不能使用技能。[翻页]
这些特殊状态可以用道具治疗。[结束]

Depending on the matchup of the[换行]
move type and the target POKéMON's[翻页]
type, the move's effectiveness varies:[翻页]
[l][15h]: Super effective![翻页]
[l][16h]: Not very effective[翻页]
[l][17h]: Not effective at all[翻页]
(No changes for other matchups.)[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
根据使用的技能的属性和[换行]
目标POKéMON的属性不同[翻页]
技能的效果也是不同的：[翻页]
[l][15h]：效果拔群！[翻页]
[l][16h]：不是很有效[翻页]
[l][17h]：完全无效[翻页]
(其它情况则没有变化)[结束]
－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－
